name: Aetheris
description: A world once unified that was fractured into five overlapping planes by The Shattering, a catastrophic magical event approximately 2,500 years ago.

eras.name: The Age of Harmony
eras.description: The ancient era when Aetheris was a singular reality where all races existed in harmony under the watchful eye of the Luminaries - cosmic entities who maintained balance.

events.title: The First Settlements
events.description: The earliest known civilizations of Aetheris form, following the seasonal magical currents across the unified world.

events.title: The Song of Creation
events.description: The first documented use of Song Weaving magic, which becomes the primary magical practice of the era.

events.title: Formation of the Cipher Conclave
events.description: A collective of the most powerful mages forms to study the fundamental nature of reality and the Luminaries.

events.title: The Luminescent Age
events.description: A period of unprecedented growth and prosperity as the Luminaries actively guide civilization.

events.title: The Immortality Project
events.description: The Cipher Conclave begins experiments to achieve immortality by tapping into the essence of the Luminaries.

eras.name: The Shattering
eras.description: The catastrophic event that tore reality apart, splitting the world into five overlapping planes and scattering the Luminaries.

events.title: The Fatal Experiment
events.description: The Cipher Conclave's attempt to harness immortality goes catastrophically wrong, tearing the fabric of reality.

events.title: The Fracturing of the Planes
events.description: The unified world splits into five distinct planes: Verdant, Crystalline, Ashen, Tempest, and Nexus.

events.title: The Scattering of the Luminaries
events.description: The cosmic entities that maintained balance are shattered, their essences fragmented across all planes.

events.title: The First Resonance
events.description: The initial overlap between planes occurs, causing confusion and fear among survivors.

eras.name: The Age of Isolation
eras.description: A millennium when surviving populations adapted to their new isolated realities while experiencing the first Resonance Events.

events.title: The Emergence of the Five Speakers
events.description: Five individuals across different planes develop the ability to hear the "voices" of the fragmented Luminaries.

events.title: The First Planar Adaptation
events.description: Isolated populations begin developing distinct traits based on their planar environment.

events.title: The Founding of Harmonia
events.description: The first stable settlement is established on the Nexus plane, later becoming the capital of the Concordant Cities.

events.title: The Resonance Calendar
events.description: Early attempts to predict and catalogue Resonance Events lead to the creation of a new calendar system.

events.title: The First Planar Bleed Zone
events.description: An area where two planes permanently merged is discovered, leading to new theories about the nature of reality.

eras.name: The Age of Discovery
eras.description: A period when civilizations developed ways to predict and utilize Resonance Events, leading to the first intentional cross-plane settlements.

events.title: The Formation of the Harmonic Order
events.description: Scholars from across the Nexus plane unite to study and catalogue plane interactions.

events.title: The First Controlled Crossing
events.description: The Harmonic Order successfully predicts and utilizes a Resonance Event to deliberately travel between planes.

events.title: The Verdant Collective
events.description: The formation of the first society to deliberately incorporate elements of the Verdant plane into their culture.

events.title: The Crystalline Breakthrough
events.description: Facet Magic is developed, allowing for precise magical control through geometric crystal structures.

events.title: The Ghost Markets
events.description: The mysterious trading network that appears only during specific Resonance Events is established by entities known as "The Between."

eras.name: The Modern Age
eras.description: The current era where sophisticated societies have emerged that incorporate elements from multiple planes while facing new challenges.

events.title: The Concordant Charter
events.description: The seven city-states of the Nexus plane form a unified government known as the Concordant Cities.

events.title: The Emergence of the Dissonant Path
events.description: A faction forms that believes The Shattering was necessary evolution and actively opposes reunification efforts.

events.title: The Luminary Chess Game
events.description: The Five Speakers begin a complex metaphysical game that corresponds to real-world events and Resonance patterns.

events.title: The Resonance Crisis Begins
events.description: Resonance Events become more frequent and unpredictable, causing concern among scholars and leaders.

events.title: The Shifting Library
events.description: The discovery of a repository of knowledge that exists simultaneously in all planes, containing potential records from before The Shattering.
